text: Ate sade la'i isa sasara vica ate praloka vica bhala'i likha de. Asim tere vala jhuka ga'e. Alaha ne kiha, maim saza use nu dida ham, jisa nu cahuda ham ate meri vi'alata hareka vasatu upara hai. Maim isa nu likha devanga bhai'a rakhana vali'am la'i ate unham la'i`jihare zakata dide hana ate sadi'am nisani'am upara bharosa rakhade hana
